value.title: ‘Alexa, what is union busting?’ John Oliver lobs tough questions at Amazon’s AI on ‘Tonight Show’
value.excerpt: Clearly Alexa is not a British soccer fan, and she spouted off about the 1985 Chicago Bears NFL team. Fired up by his annoyance with the AI, Oliver leaned into the camera from his remote location and asked, “Alexa, how bad are Amazon working conditions?”
